step.cmd: Click on "..." icon in the top right corner of OneNote to access the Print button. Click on “Print” to open the Print menu.
On the left side of the Print menu, take note of the current printer setting. If you wish to use a different printer, click on the printer name and choose a new printer from the dropdown menu.
Check and edit the settings for the number of copies, the page orientation, color mode, and scaling as you see fit.
Click on “Pages” to select if you wish to print the current page, section, section group, or entire notebook that you are in.
Click on “More settings” to adjust duplex printing, collation, paper size, paper type, paper tray, and stapling settings as you see fit. Confirm choices with the “OK” button.
